meanings.definition: Situated or lying down in the lowest or deepest position.
meanings.sent1: The cellar was the nethermost room in the house.
meanings.sent2: The cave explorer reached the nethermost point of the cavern.
meanings.sent3: The cat found the nethermost spot under the bed to hide its toy.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness was the nethermost layer of her personality, always present.
meanings.sent5: The nethermost shelf in the pantry held the oldest cans of food.

meanings.sent1: The nethermost of the ocean is a mysterious place.
meanings.sent2: The nethermost of the well held the coldest water.
meanings.sent3: The treasure chest was hidden in the nethermost of the cave.
meanings.sent4: In the nethermost of the forest, the rarest flowers bloomed.
meanings.sent5: The nethermost of the mountain was covered in eternal snow.
